title: Leave Buster bs

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: I got a leave buster on my teemo game when i didn't even get any warning, all i did was stay in a bush and wait for my shrooms and hop out for a chance to kill someone when this is complete bs for you to ban me again... I didn't feed i didn't afk i helped the team out i  shroomed up the enemy red side played appropriately didn't swear (I think)  And all i did and what i got, A 20 minute wait for 5 games.  You should get a real human being to ban people not a stupid bot.{{champion:17}}

replies.body: you do know that you can move and stay invisible while inside a bush, right?
it shouldn't be from that unless you got a notification ingame saying you're going to be counted as afk
